Name: Report Type Code
Notes: Code indicating the title or contents of a document, report or supporting item

Name: Report Transmission Code
Notes: Code defining timing, transmission method or format by which reports are to be sent

Name: Report Copies Needed
Notes: The number of copies of a report that should be sent to the addressee

Name: Entity Identifier Code
Notes: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Name: Identification Code Qualifier
Notes: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)
Remarks:
P0506: If either PWK-05 or PWK-06 is present, then the other is required
PWK05 and PWK06 may be used to identify the addressee by a code number.

Name: Identification Code
Notes: Code identifying a party or other code

Name: Description
Notes: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
Remarks: PWK07 may be used to indicate special information to be shown on the specified report.

Name: Paperwork/Report Action Code
Notes: Code specifying how the paperwork or report that is identified in the PWK segment relates to the transaction set or to identify the action that is required

Name: Paperwork/Report Action Code
Notes: Code specifying how the paperwork or report that is identified in the PWK segment relates to the transaction set or to identify the action that is required

Notes: Code specifying how the paperwork or report that is identified in the PWK segment relates to the transaction set or to identify the action that is required

Notes: Code specifying how the paperwork or report that is identified in the PWK segment relates to the transaction set or to identify the action that is required

Name: Request Category Code
Notes: Code indicating a type of request
